TextBlock.Text: CORYLUS: Expedition log... one, uhm... Things seem to be going fine, I suppose.
CORYLUS: That darn <color=orange>moon</color> might be making operations a bit difficult, but we make do!
CORYLUS: Thankfully, <color=orange>Cercis</color> is helping us build some sort of camp that'll last at least a week.
CORYLUS: ...At least, that's what he's telling us all. Sometimes he can be rather unreliable.
CORYLUS: Unfortunately, we must take cover, as the <color=orange>moon</color> approaches once more. End expedition log one.
